Instruction: Dice the nectarines, red bell pepper, and red onion into small pieces.
In a bowl, combine the diced nectarines, diced red bell pepper, thinly sliced red onion, and chopped cilantro.
Add lime juice, honey, and salt to taste.
Gently toss all ingredients together until well combined.
Refrigerate the salsa for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Serve chilled as a delicious and fruity side dish or salsa with chips.
